name: The Lonely Wisp (modking09)
description:
A Lonely Wisp is left in a world devoid of human and left in its remnants and trash, help clear the world and experience the short story.

WASD to move

E to interact and destroy trash

Space to jump

the Vignette will clear with the more items picked up!

Music By Kevin MacLeod - Incompetech.com

Assets by Synty Studios
